commit.message:
Templating (#2)

* First tweaking and tuning approach

* admin password now stored in secrets

* cleaning

* current state of things

* remove centos

* changed agent name, added install in jf

* added node tools to jenkins file

* added node plugin to jenkins

* changed tools in jf

* deleted tool

* changed to different agent

* jenkins tutorial sucks

* test dsl job works

* experimenting with pipelineJob from DSL plugin

* new approach to jobs and pipelines

* messing with dsl

* added readme

* Update readme

* jenkins booting, pipeline job cant find jf

* jf issue fixed

* experimenting with agent

* changed agent to node, added dockerpipeline plugin

* cofigured cloud agent and seed job i casc

* right port added

* Update README.md

* added git clone stage, changed docker port

* missing bracker

* deleted agent, switched to node:slim, added init hook

* back to custom agent image

* trying to fill remaining steps in pipeline

* fixed typo

* updated agent

* added build to pipeline

* also added some magic from documentation

* magic doesnt work

* typos

* cleaning pipeline

* changed jenkins port mapping, disabled test stage

* agent updated

* testing double agent approach

* changed branch in pipeline.groovy

* weird behaviour of label

* agent docker

* fighting pipeline syntax

* same

* changed tetris for test covered one

* got rid of double agent and deleted npm build from jf

* wtf

* forked repo

* fixed Deploy stage

* updated deploy stage

* updated deploy stage

* switched instructions in deploy

* added log clearing to pipeline

* more strickt log clearing

* added mailer config

* typo in mailer

* cleaning pipeline

* updated README

* fixing deploy

* checking detached mode

* set smtp port to default

* testing post stage in pipeline

* pipeline syntax sucks

* probably fixed syntax

* testing before going all in

* all post stages added

* missing bracket

* trying to attach logs

* same thing

* added schedule

* replaced my variables with placeholders

* fixies

* updated readme
